events.Title: Treasure!
events.Text: You have found a chest with various enchanted weapons.

events.Title: Well of Tranquility
events.Text: You stumble upon a Well of Tranquility where you can rest and recover before the next challenge.

events.Title: An Abandoned Armory
events.Text: An abandoned armory provides you with an opportunity to pilfer some new armor and weapons.

events.Title: Rockslide!
events.Text: A sudden rockslide injures some of your party.

events.Title: Enemy Patrols
events.Text:
You stumble into an enemy patrol!
They are easily dispatched, but they manage to do some damage to your party before dying.

events.Title: Magical Wards
events.Text: The way is trapped with magical wards that dispels all your beneficent status effects.
